message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can always negotiate further!
You got 90% last round, I'll try to get a better deal this time. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 3000. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
I'm not willing to give you 60%, but I'll meet you halfway on the 40% you offered me last round. Your turn to think!
